pageContent: Purpose: Erectile dysfunction (ED) and cardiovascular disease (CVD) share etiology and pathophysiology. The underlying pathology for preoperative ED may adversely affect survival following radical prostatectomy (RP). We examined the association between preoperative ED and survival following RP.

metaData.source:
Androgen deprivation therapy impact on quality of life and cardiovascular health, monitoring therapeutic replacement
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/23387914/
